claims: Netscape tried to include JavaScript in its browser
Netscape tried to make its browser more dynamic

state.response: نیٹ اسکیپ نے اپنے براؤزر میں جاوا اسکرپٹ شامل کرنے کی کوشش کی تاکہ اسے مزید متحرک بنایا جا سکے۔
claims: Netscape tried to include JavaScript in its browser
Netscape tried to make its browser more dynamic

Netscape tried to include JavaScript in: Did Netscape try to include JavaScript in its browser? Netscape JavaScript history

In the beginning of 1995 Netscape was one of the most popular web-browsers out there. Until that moment the WWW has been static with only HTML being available. To expand and further develop the WWW Netscape Communications Corporation created JavaScript (at that time called Mocha).
Did Netscape try to include JavaScript in its browser? Netscape JavaScript history

JavaScript was invented by Brendan Eich in 1995. It was developed for Netscape 2, and became the ECMA-262 standard in 1997. After Netscape handed JavaScript over to ECMA, the Mozilla foundation continued to develop JavaScript for the Firefox browser. Mozilla's latest version was 1.8.
Netscape tried to make its browser more: Did Netscape try to make its browser more dynamic? Netscape browser dynamic features
The Netscape browser made it possible to create more complex and dynamic websites that could incorporate different types of media, such as ...
Did Netscape try to make its browser more dynamic? Netscape browser dynamic features
Its features were said to include newsfeed support and become more integrated with the Propeller Internet portal, alongside more enhanced methods of discussion ...
Did Netscape try to make its browser more dynamic? Netscape browser dynamic features
Netscape was the original threat to Microsoft. The idea that you could have a webserver and browsers spreading files (like sign up for car ...
Did Netscape try to make its browser more dynamic? Netscape browser dynamic features
Internet Explorer introduced features that had given Netscape an edge—and even introduced their own HTML extensions, dynamic animation tools ...
Did Netscape try to make its browser more dynamic? Netscape browser dynamic features
... was to make pages more dynamic and interactive for the user. The ... Still, at this point, Netscape had been defeated, and nobody knew it more ...
Did Netscape try to make its browser more dynamic? Netscape browser dynamic features

The Netscape browser made it possible to create more complex and dynamic websites that could incorporate different types of media, such as images and videos. Another key feature of Netscape Navigator was its support for plug-ins, which allowed developers to add new functionality to the browser.
